title: Yves Peters
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150123072124/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Writers](http://web.archive.org/web/20150123072124/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Writers) : Yves Peters**

Here is what people have said about Yves Peters:

"Everyone's favourite rock 'n' roll typographer"  
 [David John Earls](http://web.archive.org/web/20150123072124/http:/typophile.com/wiki/David%20John%20Earls) of [Typographer.org](http://web.archive.org/web/20150123072124/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Typographer.org)

"He made it cool to be a Type I.D. nerd"  
 [Brian Jaramillo](http://web.archive.org/web/20150123072124/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Brian%20Jaramillo) of [Agency26](http://web.archive.org/web/20150123072124/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Agency26)

"A champion of type design"  
 [chester](http://web.archive.org/web/20150123072124/http:/typophile.com/wiki/chester%20jenkins) of [village](http://web.archive.org/web/20150123072124/http:/typophile.com/wiki/village)

"Bound to become the most feared type critic of the Northern hemisphere :D"  
 [Peter Bruhn](http://web.archive.org/web/20150123072124/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Peter%20Bruhn) of [Fountain](http://web.archive.org/web/20150123072124/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Fountain)

"His massive initial contributions to the Type Identification Board made it what it is today."  
 [Stephen Coles](http://web.archive.org/web/20150123072124/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Stephen%20Coles) of [Typographica](http://web.archive.org/web/20150123072124/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Typographica)

"I'm just a glorified type nerd, really"  
 [Yves Peters](http://web.archive.org/web/20150123072124/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Yves%20Peters)

**Affiliated with:  
 [Unzipped](http://web.archive.org/web/20150123072124/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Unzipped) ¶ blogger  
 [http://www.fontshop.be/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150123072124/http:/www.fontshop.be/ "http://www.fontshop.be/")  
 [The FontFeed](http://web.archive.org/web/20150123072124/http:/typophile.com/wiki/The%20FontFeed) ¶ contributor  
 [http://www.fontfeed.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150123072124/http:/www.fontfeed.com/ "http://www.fontfeed.com/")  
 [Typographer.org](http://web.archive.org/web/20150123072124/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Typographer.org) ¶ columnist  
 [http://www.typographer.org/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150123072124/http:/www.typographer.org/ "http://www.typographer.org/")  
 [Typographica](http://web.archive.org/web/20150123072124/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Typographica) ¶ contributor  
 [http://typographica.org/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150123072124/http:/typographica.org/ "http://typographica.org/")  
 [Typophile](http://web.archive.org/web/20150123072124/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Typophile)** ¶ head moderator Type Identification Board

**Don Q Design** ¶ owner, (typo)graphic designer, writer  
 **[Troubleman](http://web.archive.org/web/20150123072124/http:/www.myspace.com/troublemantheband)** ¶ drummer, founding member
author: Bald Condensed
